adrFormatAddress: 665 Broadway, New York, NY 10012, USA

editorialSummary.text: Seattle-based coffeehouse chain known for its signature roasts, light bites and WiFi availability.

originalText.text:
The Starbucks is pretty clean with plenty of room.

The Starbucks location in New York City that I frequent has become a comforting oasis amidst the hustle and bustle of this vibrant metropolis. Situated in the heart of Manhattan, this Starbucks manages to capture the essence of the city while offering a refuge for both locals and tourists.

The atmosphere is quintessentially New York. Its interior combines modern design elements with nods to the city's history, creating a unique ambiance. Whether you're seeking a cozy corner to work in or a communal table for socializing, this location accommodates diverse needs. The floor-to-ceiling windows provide a glimpse of the city's energy, making it an ideal spot for people-watching.

What truly sets this Starbucks apart is its exceptional staff. The baristas are not only skilled at crafting a perfect cup of coffee but also excel in customer service. They remember regulars' names and orders, fostering a sense of community that is rare in a city known for its anonymity.

In terms of offerings, this Starbucks is well-stocked and has a reputation for consistency. From their classic brews to seasonal specialties, the quality remains top-notch.

The only drawback is the inevitable crowds, especially during peak hours. However, the quick and efficient service helps mitigate this issue.

In conclusion, the Starbucks location in New York City I frequent offers a quintessentially New York experience. Its blend of atmosphere, dedicated staff, and quality offerings make it a standout choice in a city filled with coffee options. It's a slice of comfort in the bustling heart of Manhattan.

originalText.text: My best experience ever at a Starbucks. Chris and Jay were the absolute kindest of people, and brought such a positive feeling to the day. Highly recommend and thank you.

text.text: My best experience ever at a Starbucks. Chris and Jay were the absolute kindest of people, and brought such a positive feeling to the day. Highly recommend and thank you.

originalText.text: What a service! With a 50% off drinks on Wednesday these days, I understand staffs can be overwhelming. But not this specific place. I am shook by the service they are providing to all customers specially the guy who is giving out the orders. Their enthusiasm and energy can’t match anywherelse! So thank you to all the staffs for their amazing services. They all deserved a raise.

originalText.text: poor service and very rude staff. Today, 50 minutes after closing, the bathrooms were closed for no reason. When I went to ask they told me they would reopen them only after 20 minutes... clearly a lie!!! In the end they kicked us out of the club in such a rude way and with very aggressive communication methods full of insults!!! I definitely won't set foot in Starbucks again... congratulations to the manager he should be fired!!!!

originalText.text: I just entered the Starbucks on Broadway and bond and it was just the best experience. The staff was warm and so engaged with their customers. I was immediately spoken to and asked if I needed more time. They spoke with so much fun and laughter while being so professional. They really made it worth stopping in. Great staff. We need more people like them.
